tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_vital_signs (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  heart_rate INT,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR,
  temperature FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE PatientVitalSigns (
    patient_id INT,
    vital_sign_name VARCHAR(255),
    vital_sign_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, timestamp)
)

CREATE TABLE AlertLogs (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    alert_description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES PatientVitalSigns(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE alerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  alert_type VARCHAR,
  alert_message TEXT,
  alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE vital_signs (
    patient_id INT,
    heart_rate INT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR,
    temperature FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, timestamp)
)

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    vital_sign VARCHAR,
    threshold FLOAT,
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    alert_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    phone_number VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE monitoring_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    completed BOOLEAN,
    session_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT NOT NULL,
  gender ENUM('male', 'female', 'other') NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE
);
